author: BBC News
title: Ukraine conflict: Your guide to understanding day four
description: The EU is sending arms to Ukraine and banning Russian flights. Here's what you need to know after Day Four of the war.
content:
Media caption, Watch: ''People have swapped their pens and keyboards for guns''
The EU is taking the unprecedented step of sending arms to Ukraine following Russia's invasion.
